fullplot: Gote (zohar) and Eli (einsteen) are two aging friends who dont want to age. Gote is a lifeguard who's fighting peepers on the Tel-Aviv beach. Eli is a guitar player who dreams of building a night club in altman's restaurant.

title: Peeping Toms
